title: Quota limiter: correct the mehod to limit cpu
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/9a43faf4da20389a4e2c262ee8ab8b369a3bfec4. After https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/12151

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
don't matter

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
don't matter

### What did you expect?
1. The `foreground-cpu-time` configured by the user will be reduced by a fixed factor, which is not necessary.
2. The result returned by cpu_limiter does not need to be processed additionally.

### What did happened?
original implement don't affect the correctness of the results.
